meta.en: We are excited to announce the winners of the 2nd international music composition competition "Future Symphony"!
meta.lt: Džiaugsmingai pranešame II-ojo tarptautinio kompozicijų simfoniniam orkestrui konkurso rezultatus!

short.en: We are excited to announce the winners of the 2<sup>nd</sup> international music composition competition "Future Symphony"!
short.lt: Džiaugsmingai pranešame II-ojo tarptautinio kompozicijų simfoniniam orkestrui konkurso rezultatus!

full.en:
We are excited to announce the winners of the 2nd international music composition competition "Future Symphony"!

1st place:
🇲🇽 Charles Philip Daniels Torres ("The Myth of Déremot-Bélel")

2nd place:
🇱🇹 Jievaras Jasinskis ("Change")

3rd place:
🇩🇪🇵🇱 Roman Czura ("Rythms Drowned in Dreams")
🇱🇹 Andrius Maslekovas ("Waters-Reflections-Haiku")

Saulius Karosas special prize for the best composition of the Lithuanian author:
🇱🇹 Jievaras Jasinskis ("Change")

Audience Sympathy prize:
🇭🇺 Apor Szüts ("Rondo una quasi toccata")

Orchestra Sympathy prize:
🇭🇺 Apor Szüts ("Rondo una quasi toccata")


Also, the following pieces were performed:
🇬🇷 Miran Tsalikian "Baltic Tribes (Renaissance of Lith)"
🇮🇹 Daniele Testa "The Mirrors Room"

CONGRATULATIONS TO THE COMPOSERS!
full.lt:
Džiaugsmingai pranešame II-ojo tarptautinio kompozicijų simfoniniam orkestrui konkurso rezultatus!

1-oji vieta:
🇲🇽 Charles Philip Daniels Torres ("The Myth of Déremot-Bélel")

2-oji vieta:
🇱🇹 Jievaras Jasinskis ("Change")

3-ioji vieta:
🇩🇪🇵🇱 Roman Czura ("Rythms Drowned in Dreams")
🇱🇹 Andrius Maslekovas ("Waters-Reflections-Haiku")

Sauliaus Karoso fondo įsteigtas specialius prizas „už geriausią lietuvių autoriaus kūrinį“:
🇱🇹 Jievaras Jasinskis ("Change")

Publikos simpatija:
🇭🇺 Apor Szüts ("Rondo una quasi toccata")

Orkestro simpatija:
🇭🇺 Apor Szüts ("Rondo una quasi toccata")


Taip pat šie kūriniai buvo atlikti finalinio turo metu:
🇬🇷 Miran Tsalikian "Baltic Tribes (Renaissance of Lith)"
🇮🇹 Daniele Testa "The Mirrors Room"

SVEIKINIMAI KOMPOZITORIAMS!
